meanings.definition: To make a duplicate copy of a document using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: She was photoduplicating important papers for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The office staff spent the afternoon photoduplicating various reports.
meanings.sent3: The photoduplicating machine decided to take a break right before the deadline.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like a photoduplicating machine, perfectly replicating every detail.
meanings.sent5: The sound of photoduplicating echoed through the room, signaling productivity.

meanings.definition: The process of creating duplicate copies of documents using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: Photoduplicating is a common task in most offices nowadays.
meanings.sent2: The quality of the photoduplicating service at the store impressed the customers.
meanings.sent3: The photoduplicating room was always busy, with papers flying everywhere.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, photoduplicating has become quicker and more efficient.
meanings.sent5: The art of photoduplicating requires attention to detail and precision.
